title: Wand of wind
data:
The **wand of wind** is a new wand introduced in [SporkHack](/wiki/SporkHack "SporkHack") and subsequently adapted into many variants.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Effects](#Effects)

- [2 Variants](#Variants)

  - [2.1 SporkHack](#SporkHack)
  - [2.2 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [2.3 SliceHack/SpliceHack](#SliceHack.2FSpliceHack)
  - [2.4 HackEM](#HackEM)

- [3 History](#History)

- [4 References](#References)

## Effects

In all variants, a **wand of wind** can [hurtle](/wiki/Hurtle "Hurtle") monsters (possibly into water or lava) and scatters items wherever it is blasted. If a monster is hurtled as a result, this wand will [auto-identify](/wiki/Auto-identify "Auto-identify"). Big monsters can be hurtled 1-2 spaces, anything smaller can be hurtled 3-5 spaces.

When [engraved](/wiki/Engrave "Engrave") with, it gives the message "The bugs on the floor are blown away!"

If zapped at the ground, it wipes away any engraving on the floor and scatters any items on that square.

If zapped at yourself, it will hurtle you in a random direction and scatter objects at your location: "You are caught up in the winds!"

## Variants

### SporkHack

| /               |                                                               |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name            | wind                                                          |
| Appearance      | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
| Base price      | 150 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                             |
| Weight          | 7                                                             |
| Type            | beam                                                          |
| Maximum charges | 8                                                             |
| Monster use     | *Will not be used by monsters.*                               |

In [SporkHack](/wiki/SporkHack "SporkHack"), this wand can also be used to blow doors apart. It was not enabled for monster use.

If zapped at an open [drawbridge](/wiki/Drawbridge "Drawbridge"), it will destroy the drawbridge.

### SlashTHEM

| /               |                                                               |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name            | wind                                                          |
| Appearance      | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
| Base price      | 200 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                             |
| Weight          | 7                                                             |
| Type            | beam                                                          |
| Maximum charges | 8                                                             |
| Monster use     | *Will not be used by monsters.*                               |

The [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") implementation closely follows the SporkHack version, with the only notable difference being the cost.

### SliceHack/SpliceHack

| /               |                                                                                 |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name            | windstorm                                                                       |
| Appearance      | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance")                   |
| Base price      | 300 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                               |
| Weight          | 7                                                                               |
| Type            | beam                                                                            |
| Maximum charges | 8                                                                               |
| Monster use     | *May be used [offensively](/wiki/Offensive_item "Offensive item") by monsters.* |

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), it was renamed to "wand of windstorm" and granted some additional effects. It also costs 300 instead of 150.

In addition to the [wand of nothing](/wiki/Wand_of_nothing "Wand of nothing") and [wand of wonder](/wiki/Wand_of_wonder "Wand of wonder"), this wand was also marked as non-magical. This might have been a copy-paste error due to this wand being listed immediately after those other non-magical wands. On engrave, this wand [auto-identifies](/wiki/Auto-identifies "Auto-identifies").

When broken, this wand gives the message "A tornado surrounds you!"

In SpliceHack, monsters can zap the wand of wind at you offensively, "You get blasted by hurricane-force winds!"

Zapping this wand inside a [whirly](/wiki/Whirly "Whirly") monster will make it expel you: "You blast a hole in \<monster>!", otherwise nothing happens and the "\<monster> burps."

If you zap yourself, you get the message "Whoosh!". If you are polymorphed into a whirly form, you abuse [constitution](/wiki/Constitution "Constitution"). With [unchanging](/wiki/Unchanging "Unchanging") you immediately rehumanize ("The wind blasts you apart!"); without unchanging, you take 5d6 damage. If you aren't a whirly form you don't take any damage. You are, however, not hurtled.

If zapped upward, nothing happens except "You stir up a whirlwind above you!"

If zapped down, nothing happens except "You scour the floor with wind!"

When zapped at a [drawbridge](/wiki/Drawbridge "Drawbridge"), the drawbridge won't be affect but you get this [YAFM](/wiki/YAFM "YAFM"): "For all your huffing and puffing, you cannot blow this drawbridge down."

### HackEM

| /               |                                                                                 |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name            | wind                                                                            |
| Appearance      | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance")                   |
| Base price      | 300 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                               |
| Weight          | 7                                                                               |
| Type            | beam                                                                            |
| Maximum charges | 8                                                                               |
| Monster use     | *May be used [offensively](/wiki/Offensive_item "Offensive item") by monsters.* |

The [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM") implementation closely follows SpliceHack's with a few minor tweaks

It is marked as [magical](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item") and was renamed back to "wand of wind".

Zapping yourself also hurtles you in a random direction.

## History

2008: The wand of wind first appeared in SporkHack.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

At some unknown date, it was ported into SLASH'EM Extended from Spork, and made it's way into SlashTHEM.

2018: It was adapted into SliceHack <https://github.com/msearle5/slicehack/commit/7ec1e3c18c93c641bcd9e5f3f7927d490364d56e> and later merged into SpliceHack. [\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

2022: It was ported from SpliceHack into Hack'EM.[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) <https://github.com/bhaak/sporkhack/commit/4bdf6875803f52e9be099e2f94e030f4665dcaab>
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) <https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/commit/ccb30e50ecaaa8ae6e5b51a1e46b4c0f2b797af9>
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) <https://github.com/elunna/hackem/commit/86ce9a905f7f921462c9b3bb766dba7cf1ca16ed>
